ARABIC: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It will be but one Great Blast, and they will all be summoned to Our presence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It would be but a single blast of the trumpet, and they would all be arraigned before Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then there will simply be one single Blast, and all will have gathered before Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Only after a single blast of sound, they will all be brought into Our presence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is just one scream, and every one of them will be brought together before Us!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It will be but a single Sayhah, so behold they will all be brought up before Us!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There would be naught but a single cry, when lo! they shall all be brought before Us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It was only one Cry; then behold, they are all arraigned before Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is but one Shout, and behold them brought together before Us!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It will be but one blast, and they will all be brought before Us together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It shall be but one shout; and lo! they shall all be brought together before us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It will be but a single Cry, and, behold, they will all be presented before Us!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It will be no more than a single Blast, when lo! they will all be brought up before Us!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It will be but a single Saihah (shout, etc.), so behold! They will all be brought up before Us!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And it is but one Shout and they are all arraigned before Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It will be but a single scream; and behold, they will all be brought before Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:53] It is but a single Cry, and, behold, they will all be arraigned before Us!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It is but one Shout) it is but one blow which is the blowing of the Resurrection, (and behold them brought together before Us) for reckoning!
